short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for collecting YouTube videos which tends to write notes later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspod allows you to discover ideas from YouTube. Mark key moments, take quick notes, and share your insights with the world.
